TITLE: WEB Interface - Live-Reporter+
MSG_0:
Live-Reporter+ has WEB interface function.

The interface allow to setting parameters

(capture, video, network and etc.) accessing.
MSG_1:
Main View

The WEB interface consists of

home, video, audio, network and superimpose settings.

The WEB interface Main(Home) screen is shown as below.

Live-Reporter+ main screen components are controled by

these WEB interface text fields and buttons.
MSG_2:
Video Settings

This WEB interface control video setting parameters.
MSG_3:
Audio Settings

This WEB interface control audio setting parameters.
MSG_4:
Network Settings

This WEB interface control network setting parameters.
MSG_5:
Superimpose Settings

This WEB interface control superimpose setting parameters.
